title: Modernising the Contact Center for Always-On Service: AI Promises, Human Reality
summary: The article discusses the importance of properly integrating AI into contact centers to enhance customer experience. It warns that while AI can extend coverage, it can also downgrade experiences and increase the emotional burden on agents if not implemented correctly. The piece emphasizes the need for a balance between AI capabilities and human intervention in contact centers.
hook: AI in contact centers: a balance between promise and human reality.
